name: Laughs Last
description:
Description:  

The Laughing Dog has cloned our favourite retro game characters and kidnapped the heroes. Rescue them all to have a chance to (finally) shoot the Laughing Dog.

Controls:

  • Move: WASD (or Arrow Keys)
  • Spin: Space Bar (or Mouse2)
  • Shoot: Ctrl (or Mouse1)

Developed in Unity at Ptbo GameJam 03 by:

  • Rob Waite
  • Heather Watson
  • Chris Stretten
  • Dennis Carlstrom

Install:

After download, unzip and launch to play.
